content.title: Hepatic Artery Aneurysm
content.description: Second most common visceral aneurysm, often found incidentally on imaging studies.
content.clinical_pearl: True aneurysms of proper hepatic artery may require complex reconstruction; pseudoaneurysms often treatable by embolization alone
